definitions.definition: An untanned leather , often dyed green; originally made from horse skin, today mostly made from the skin of a shark or ray .
A rough or spiny surface of an insect's cuticle.

main_definition: An untanned leather , often dyed green; originally made from horse skin, today mostly made from the skin of a shark or ray .
secondary_definitions: ( entomology ) A rough or spiny surface of an insect's cuticle.
